content.text: Even though the Covalent components are built on Material Design, we maintain a distinct point of view within Covalent. The color palette, tokens, typography, iconography, and interaction patterns reflect Teradata's brand and our focus on delivering an excellent user experience.
The Covalent documentation uses the Teradata voice. In it, we focus on the user context and articulate the "why," "what," and "how" with product examples.
